text: Louis Alexandre d'Albignac (1739–1825) was a French général de division (major general). He was a chevalier of the Legion of Honour and a commander of the Order of Saint Louis. ==References== * Category:1739 births Category:1825 deaths Category:Chevaliers of the Légion d'honneur Category:Commanders of the Order of Saint Louis
title: Louis Alexandre d'Albignac
